cards.title: Synthesize HIPAA-protected healthcare data
cards.description: Apply safeguards to healthcare datasets designed for HIPAA requirements while maintaining data utility for analysis and model training.

sampleDataset.description: This healthcare dataset contains patient identifiers, demographics, medical events, and clinical notes spanning multiple healthcare facilities, with both structured fields and free-text observations.

cards.title: [New] Generate multi-turn conversations from scratch
cards.description: Use Data Designer to quickly generate diverse conversational data to train AI agents. Improve handling of edge cases and reduce user frustration.

cards.title: Transform unstructured data into AI-ready formats
cards.description: De-identify, transform, or label text and tabular data for AI. Leverage powerful entity detection with smart defaults that automatically identify and handle PII with minimal configuration.

sampleDataset.description: This patient dataset contains names, addresses and other personally identifiable information, which needs to be redacted before the dataset can be shared or used to train ML models.

cards.title: Generate Text-to-Code training data for coding assistants
cards.description: Create diverse instruction-code pairs in Python or SQL across multiple domains to fine-tune coding assistants that transform natural language into accurate, executable code.

cards.title: Create synthetic data with provable privacy guarantees
cards.description: Build realistic synthetic datasets with differential privacy protection - perfect for regulatory compliance or when mathematical privacy guarantees are required.

sampleDataset.description: This dataset contains reviews, ratings, and categories for women's clothing.

cards.title: Produce custom RAG evaluation datasets
cards.description: Craft domain-specific reference documents, queries, and ground truth answers to measure your RAG system's performance across real-world scenarios and edge cases.

cards.title: Create GDPR-ready synthetic customer data
cards.description: Develop privacy-protected synthetic versions of customer datasets containing personal identifiers. Transform sensitive fields and generate realistic synthetic data that maintains analytical utility while implementing GDPR privacy principles.

sampleDataset.description: This e-commerce dataset contains 500 customer records with personal identifiers (email, address), digital footprints, browsing behavior metrics, membership duration, and annual spending amounts.

cards.title: Produce free text data with privacy guarantees
cards.description: Leverage differentially private fine-tuning with Text Fine-Tuning to generate a provably-private version of your free text data.

sampleDataset.description: This clinical notes dataset contains medical observations written by healthcare providers during patient care. It includes personally identifiable information which needs to be redacted before the dataset can be shared or used to train ML models.

cards.title: Optimize your synthetic data
cards.description: Automate hyperparameter tuning to create the best synthetic data for your task.

cards.title: Generate synthetic data from complex tabular datasets
cards.description: Handle high-dimensional data with thousands of columns and millions of rows.

sampleDataset.description: Use this sample electronic health records (EHR) dataset to synthesize an entirely new set of statistically equivalent records.

cards.title: Create provably private versions of sensitive data
cards.description: Use Gretel Tabular DP, our graph-based generative model, to generate synthetic data with strong differential privacy guarantees.

sampleDataset.description: This dataset contains direct marketing campaign details (phone calls) from a Portuguese financial institution. It has sensitive information such as demographics and financials, which can benefit from privacy preserving techniques before sharing.

cards.title: Generate synthetic text data using Text Fine-Tuning
cards.description: Quickly generate diverse text examples for natural language tasks, simplifying the generation of labeled datasets.

sampleDataset.description: Create realistic banking-related questions and intent labels using this sample dataset.

cards.title: Boost minority class data
cards.description: Train a model on a dataset with sparse instances of the minority class, and conditionally generate additional minority samples.

cards.title: Benchmark multiple synthetic models
cards.description: Evaluate multiple synthetic data models on a standardized benchmark with a single function.
